content.detailedDescription: I was riding my motorcycle west on historic route 66 in golden valley arizona. the area is a wide open valley with a clear view in all directions of approx 25 miles or more. it was a clear day, no clouds. i observed a metallic looking object ascending so slowly it was almost hovering. the closest shape i could describe is that of an airstream trailer. it wasnt very long and the ends had a rounded shape. i continued to observe it for 1 to 2 mins as it basically hovered. as i was riding, i had to take my eyes off it for just a few seconds to correct myself in the road. when i looked back up, it was gone. i was about mid way in the valley and had a clear view of the sky in all directions as it's open desert. i searched every direction from horizon to overhead, it was nowhere to be seen.
content.summary: Ufo was making very slow assent or hovering.

content.detailedDescription:
My and three friends were camping outside of beaufort, vic, aussie. at around 5 in the morning (2009) we all witnessed an orange orb traveling through the sky, starting about 30 degrees above the horizon.  it had not sound.  i do not know which cardinal direction it was traveling, but it first appeared to our left (coming from behind us).  it seemed to be moving slower than an airplane and had no parabolic trajectory.  

it seemed to either be very close as it passed by, (yet with no sound) and moving relatively slowly....Or, if it was further away than we perceived, it would have also been dramatically larger than we thought.  it is difficult to tell exactly how far away it was....But it was clearly a glowing orange sphere, with no trail.

we then watched for approximately another 20 to 30 minutes as it slowly disappeared into the darkness of space.  it obviously was not a plane since it did not fly towards the horizon or follow the curvature of the earth...We also know it was not a flare of some sort since it obviously was not launched..It flew at an angle of about 20 degrees upwards from the horizon, and gradually curved up into the blackness of the night. 

a good 20 minutes later, it was still a tiny spec in the sky...Eventually we lost it when it became too small to see with the naked eye.
content.summary: Large orange orb - no parabolic trajectory or engine- glided past us and flew into outer space

content.detailedDescription:
This could very well be a meteorite burning up in the atmosphere but witness has never saw anything like it. witness was out smoking from her place of work and saw in the distance "a red line that kept on getting larger just like fire" that seemed to be falling towards horizon. witness watched for several minutes until she could no longer see it behind the houses in front of her. picture taken but witness said the object was much more visible with own eyes. 

1st picture is the original, you can see object just above the building on the left. 
2cd is a zoomed in on picture. 
3rd is in differential coloring.
content.summary: Red line that kept getting larger as it fell.

content.detailedDescription:
I was going to work, heading north/west on m59 between rochester rd and  livernois ave.  at 5:28am, i observed a single bright white light in the sky falling rapidly towards the ground. the object appeared about 30 degrees to the left of my heading on m-59, falling at an angle towards the highway. my first thought was that this aircraft was going to crash. but the light diminished about 1000 ft above the ground. the sighting only lasted about 3 seconds.

details.
��� the angle of decent was about 20 degrees from vertical.
��� the object appeared to be about a mile away.
��� the object did not appear to be a meteor. i have seen these in the past and they tend to be extremely bright with a bluish tint. the light emitted by a meteor that close would have lit up the surrounding area for miles around. the light emitted by this object was pure white, and it did not illuminate any of the surrounding area.
��� the objects rate of decent was as though it was in an uncontrolled free fall.
��� the manner in which the light diminished was as though an aircraft suddenly pulled out of a dive and it's light pointed away from me.
��� i did not observe any indications of an object crashing to ground. as i continued along the highway i often looked to my left to see if i could spot anything.
��� traffic on the highway was very light at that time in the morning, but there must have been more than 20 drivers who could have witnesses the event.

once at work, i was describing this event to a co-worker who sat near me when another co-worker overheard me. he came over to report that he had seen the same thing. he was driving to work along south blvd going west and was near coolidge hwy when he saw the object sitting motionless in the sky - and then falling. from his vantage, the object appeared to be coming down on the north side of south blvd. he also said he knew it was not a meteor. he lost sight of the object as it was falling due to trees blocking his view.
content.summary: Brightly illuminated falling oblect, disapeared before hitting ground

content.detailedDescription: Returning from church, i saw the orb in the sky again.  i watched it for a while.  as it was neared the point where it disappears, it blinked red again, this time it seemed to have been more intensified than before.  i watched it and look away for a second and it was gone.  about ten minutes later, i noticed another-or the same object- object the sky where the first object is usually seen.  it later disappeared.
content.summary: White orb moving west and then blinking red light and possible second object seen

content.detailedDescription: I and another individual entered my back yard on our way inside the house for supper when something caught my attention. i looked to the east out my yard and witnessed a strange orange glow. i asked my friend if he saw it as well and yes he did. i was not certain what this was but think it may be a natural event until the end of my siting. we stood and watched the glow for a couple of minutes to see if anything changed. when nothing changed my friend went inside while i stayed out. i felt compelled to keep an eye on whatever it was. i was glad i did.After about another 3 minutes or so the large orange glow started to changed. it began to shrink in size and to desribed what it looked like, i would say it was like a vacum trying to suck in smoke. the mass of orange shrank slowly over abount 2 minutes until it was very small and far in the distance. when it reached the smallest of points it was no longer orange but merely a white spot in a blue sky. after becoming so small and having changed color it flickered a few times and flashed quickly before blinking out. i was slightly worried about what i saw and what others would say, so about a year later i asked the other witness if he recalled seeing it and after several minutes of talking he finally said he had but not to bring it up again. he was afraid he would be taken as crazy. total time observed was about 5 minutes.
content.summary: Observed glowing orange spot in otherwise clear blue sky

content.detailedDescription: I was watching a white orb in the sky yet again.  around the point it would disappear, it did something different.  it began to display a red light that would brighten then fade, then brighten again.  it had never done this before.  it was odd.  it might have been a kind of "goodbye" response because i would not see the object again for several nights.
content.summary: White orb moving west and then blinking red light

content.detailedDescription: An white object was seen in the sky for the fifth night in a row.  it was in its usual spot in the western night sky.  i first saw it at 7:10pm.  i watched it and about five minutes of watching it, a blinking object approached it.  i think it was airplane.  as the blinking object approached the orb, the aircraft went over and around it.  the plane flew northwest and out of my line of sight.  shortly after that, a jet came out of northeast and flew by the object.  minutes later, a second jet would fly by closer to the object than the first one.  they both left contrails in the sky.  the second jet disappeared out of my line of sight.  at about 7:40, the white orb disappeared also.
content.summary: Ufo seen in the sky fifth night in a row.

content.detailedDescription: It was about 7:40pm when a bright white orb was spotted in the sky above my home.  it glowed quite brighter than the stars in sky and was the only object seen in that particular part of the sky.  i watched the object for about five minutes and thought it might be spinning.  i stopped watching it, thinking it might simply be a star.  i checked on it later at about 8:20 and saw it had moved west.  i checked again at 9:20 and it was gone.  this would only prove to be one of the first sightings of the object that would continue to come back at about the same time almost every night since.
content.summary: A white orb was hovering in the sky.  over the course of an hour it moved west and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving down ball rd in anaheim and saw a weirdly blinking helicopter.... after watching it for 2 minutes at a red light, noticed it was clearly not a helicopter by the weird flashes, above the flying unit and to one side, a "circle" of red lights would flash... then on the other side there would be singular orange and green lights that would flash. there were other helicopters in the area - and they did not compare. as we drove down ball, the flying thing nearly passed over our car, we rolled down the window and it was silent - no noise, and the bottom of the craft was a matte black and flat - with what looked like a seam down the middle. it was hard to tell the shape but it looked triangular. have never seen anything like it.
content.summary: Lights prominent on top and to one side, silent, low to ground, flat surface on bottom

content.detailedDescription: I was cooking dinner when i got over heated.  i decided to go out on the balcony to get some fresh air. i looked up to my left and saw a very bright,flame like pulsating orange orb hovering silently below the cloud canopy. i called my friend and children from inside the apt to come and take a look. very strange we thought for it was not a plane nor a helicopter. it was as if an orange star was hovering below the cloud cover.  we then hurried to try and video tape the event.  as my friend started to video tape the event the orb suddenly began ascending at an incredible rate of speed in a diagonal path up through the clouds and then disappearing completely from sight in a matter of approx.3 seconds.  as if camera shy.  this is my third ufo sighting in the denver area. since ive moved here in 1996.
content.summary: Saw very bright. pulsating orange orb hovering in the sky with no sound beneath the cloud blanket cover.  went to video tape event  when orb ascended at an incredible speed in a diagonal path up through the clouds and then dissapearing completly from sigh

content.detailedDescription: After i posted my report, i discovered the source of the massive sound was a huge gas pipe rupture not too far from my property. details of the rupture can be found on wafb channel 9 news. this is a big relief for me because i couldnt understand why this thing made so much noise and the characteristics of all the orbs that i normally see make absolutely zero noise.
content.summary: Massive object heard not seen (revealed)

content.detailedDescription: I downloaded a computer telescope software to look at the night sky and noticed around 10 simular objects all over the sky.They are very huge in plain sight. they are round with channels cut into them like different levels or something and one of the objects seems to have a smaller object entering it. and on another you can see those same objects parked on one of the floors of the bigger ship and in another it looks like 2 might be powered up because they are emmitiing a bright light source. so to make sure these same objects appear on another program i crossed refrenced the locations and sure enough the same object on both programs from different telescopes. so these are real and there very close and very big. please contact me and i will give you the locations of these things so you can look for yourself. here is the proof!
content.summary: I downloaded a computer sky telescope program and found about ten simular shaped object all over the place. these things must be some type of mothership or moon sized artificial planets

content.detailedDescription: I downloaded a computer telescope software to look at the night sky and noticed around 10 simular objects all over the sky.They are very huge in plain sight. they are round with channels cut into them like different levels or something and one of the objects seems to have a smaller object entering it. and on another you can see those same objects parked on one of the floors of the bigger ship and in another it looks like 2 might be powered up because they are emmitiing a bright light source. so to make sure these same objects appear on another program i crossed refrenced the locations and sure enough the same object on both programs from different telescopes. so these are real and there very close and very big. please contact me and i will give you the locations of these things so you can look for yourself. here is the proof!
content.summary: I downloaded a computer sky telescope program and found about ten simular shaped object all over the place. these things must be some type of mothership or moon sized artificial planets

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i were driving on the bangor rd, heading into ellsworth. while driving bright lights caught my eyes to the right but well in front of me.  i thought at first that there was a fire in the distant tree line, or perhaps i was seeing a cell tower or even a low flying plane.  i watched these lights and noticed they were not blinking the way a tower or plane would.  i brought what i was seeing to the attention of my husband. we both began questioning what we were seeing.  i told him to get the video camera (we had just come from a sporting event), and although he had tried to record it, the camera kept saying the lense cap was on (which it was not).  as we approached it more, it was evident how huge these lights were.  the object was far too low to be a plane and none of the lights blinked.  there were 3 white lights in the shape of a triangle, with a smaller red light in the center.  we knew it couldn't be a plane because 1) the lights didn't blink 2) there was no noise coming from the lights, and we were pretty close to it.  the object simply hovered in the sky while we drove by it.  we could not see any "craft", simple the lights and blackness.  we could not pull over to try to get a better look, because we were traveling in a long line of traffic, and the roads were a sheet of ice.  i had tried to slow down and was almost rear ended.  we crested the hill, and then we could no longer see the object.  we didn't go back later that night because my husband had to get to work, and the roads were so bad.

the next day, i drove back to the area where we saw the lights.  there are no cell towers at all in this area.  (i had thought perhaps there might have been a new tower i wasn't aware of).  the only towers that are in that general area are on bald mountain.  while you can somewhat see those towers from the road, the lights they give off appear very small, they are all red, and they blink.  this object had 3 solid white lights that i could only visually compare to basketball size... which would make them huge in reality, and 1 sold red light that would be comperable to softball size (again, this would be huge, porportionately).   again, solid lights, no blinking, and it made no sound.  my husband was in the passengers side and had a little better look, and he said there appeared to be a light trail of smoke or mist following it.   after doing some research, the picture of the belgian triangle sighting is about as close to what we saw as i can get.
content.summary: My husband and i witnessed three giant white lights in a triangle formation with 1 red smaller light in the center.

content.detailedDescription: While letting my dog out last night to use the bathroom. i stood at the back door waiting for her. all a sudden i saw a bright reddish orange light whiched looked like it came from the front of the house. it scanned across the patio which lite up the whole patio.It headed to the back of the patio and toward the back of the yard. my dog saw it and ran as fast as she could to the door. i let her in and quickly closed the back door. it was to scared to look outside.
content.summary: While letting my dog outside on patio a bright red light hovered over the patio. it lite the whole patio up.

content.detailedDescription: I don't really know how to explain what is going on around here. i just know that i'm starting to get a bit fearful of what i've been seeing and hearing over the span of several months. it all started with a green laser i purchased some months back. actually, its been over a year now. to make a years worth of stories short, i, along with a select few have seen bizarre lights and unusual craft in the sky do amazing things including laser-to-ufo and ufo-to-laser communication. without fail, these craft show up every night  i beckon them except on heavily overcast nights like last night which was also too cold to go out. i had gotten the kids to bed around 9:30 and started feeling drowsy at around 10:45 so i went to bed. suddenly, i awoke with a jolt. i immediately thought a jumbo jet was taking off and flying directly over my house. i thought to myself "my god that's loud! taking forever to go away" as i tried to go back to sleep, but the rumbling was just too loud. frustrated, i staggered over to the front door which faces east and opened to see where all that noise was coming from. the sky was heavily clouded and the roar of what seemed to be a dozen 747's was just slightly 45 degrees from the horizon north north east of my position at about 500+- feet out. i could tell that it was moving extremely slowly away from my position. as i stood in the jam of the door, i began to get a feeling of fear and dread as i knew this sound was not of a typical aircraft that i am familiar with. at that moment tiny drops of hail began to fall. the sound of the craft took a little over an hour to completely fade in the distance (around 3:30am). very slowly, everything started to settle down and the air was calm and quiet again, but i cant forget that sound.
content.summary: Intense and massive object heard but not seen!

content.detailedDescription: I'm a trained aviation weather observer who is familiar with both civil and military aircraft and a wide variety of meteorological phenomena. @27degrees 03'21.84"n 82 degrees 14'59.49" w, after sunset in late november or early december of 1978 i was with a friend at that approximate location. it was long enough after sunset that there was complete darkness. the night was clear and visibility was unrestricted, also at that time the moon was not in the sky. at about 270 degrees (west) i noticed a line of red and orange lights blinking in a "chase" pattern low on the horizon moving from the south to the north. there were other aircraft in the sky during this time period displaying the normal red, white and green anti-collision lights, none of the aircraft were in the immediate vicinity of the sighted phenomena. the object (?) made absolutely no noise and neither changed altitude nor appeared to change its' course. i observed it until it was lost from sight by distance. due to the darkness i was unable to determine the shape of the object. what i can say is that it was definitely not a fixed wing or rotary winged aircraft as it was completely silent. due to the darkness both distance and altitude were impossible to accurately estimate. for years i told myself that maybe it was a blimp with some sort of light array attached to it, however a blimp would still have displayed anti-collision lighting and the horizontal stabilizer at the rear of a blimp would have interfered with the light pattern. when i pointed out the object to my friend, even he was taken by the fact that it made no noise and after it went out of sight he admonished me to never speak of this again with him. my feeling about this has always been one of curiosity, i would love to know what it was that i observed.
content.summary: Red and orange "chase" pattern of lights

content.detailedDescription: The sky was very clear, and i wanted to check out all the stars. i noticed as i was scanning the sky, off to the south thier was a bright starlike object, it was moving from the west to the east,i ran back inside to get my flashlight and tell the hubby and daughter. im standing outside flashing at this thing (probbly looking like a nut case) and it turns off its course of direction and is coming straight towards me, it gets right above me and hovers for about a minute,we are all amazed that the flashlight thing worked, we saw it on some tv show being done, the hubby and daughter were telling me to get inside, i told them no and that i wanted to know what it was, thier screaming at me that im going to get abducted, at about that time it started to go up, and as it did it turned from a glowing starlike object to a redish-orange sphere and went straight up very fast and was gone. i have to be honest, i was scared to death standing there, and the family sceaming that im going to be abducted,but something is going on and i want to get to the bottom of it.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Starlike object on directioal path, flashed flashlight at it and it turned and came hovering above me.

content.detailedDescription: Between 9pm and 9:20pm there was a line of individual red lights flying towards you, red/orange when equal to your line of vision, there was no engine noise, they moved from west to east, pretty much equally spaced except for 2 that seemed to come into view at the same time, then moved apart to the same partern spacing. the lights never blinked, and the local airport has responed as no report.
content.summary: Solid red red/orange lights in michigan sky

content.detailedDescription: It was hoovering over high school for a few minuites then it dissapeared and reapeared  afew miles away it mover west for about an hour very slow until it just vanished.
content.summary: Was hovering over school for a few minuits then it dissapeared and was about % miles out and it would  flash every 15  or so minuites

content.detailedDescription: On may 23, 2010 my husband and i were driving back home from san diego. that day i was driving and my husband was taking pictures of the scenery. i always make him take pictures and since we were by the coast i was making him take pictures of the ocean. we came home and forgot about the pictures for a few days. then my husband wanted to see them so he could email some out and post some on fb. he uploaded them into my computer and we checked them out. then we came across this picture that he had taken inside of the car and i noticed a spot. i asked him to zoom in and it looked round to me and as if it were flying in the opposite direction we were going in. the next picture was the same except, there was no spot. he didnt think anything of it but i did. i think it could be something. if i am wrong, then so be it. but i would be a fool to believe there isnt other life somewhere else.
content.summary: Dark and round

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home taking pictures of a plane from behind living room window on top floor of my house, above the street lights there was a plane coming towards my direction, i usualy take alot of snap shots of planes in order to catch ufo's as i've become interested over the years. the ufo was not visible to eyes nor the beam it projected (that looked like a searching light from its behaviour) the object and the beam was later found in the pictures as i viewed them i used an iphone app called camera plus for fast snap shots per second which explains the bad quality of the pictures. i notice there is only 3 picture slots available for upload so i will put the most enough to clearly show the beam search light.
i still dont know if what i have is a glare or solid object what makes it hard to determine is the beam it casts on the foor with no cars on the street, or any other means it could have been there.
this is for an analyst to confirm ufo or phenomenon. i would like to be contacted if anyone working for mufon comes up with an analysis thank you.

>>> i highly suggest downloading / saving these pictures on your computer and then rotating through them fast using the arrow keys to see change and movement. the beam and the ufo above it beside the building, it's a dark dot. also the plane i was originly taking pictures of is in the middle above a street light it looks like a bright light (that is the plane light it was faced towards me, it's not the ufo)

p.S i never saw the object to lose sight of it with eyes it was in the picture after i uploaded them to the computer.
content.summary: Spheric small - drone like looked small so maybe unmanned. casted a beam that scnaned clockwise around area

content.detailedDescription: I was walking from my house to the barn to feed my horses. i stopped at my car to get my jacket. i was glancing to the west down the driveway looking at venus and jupiter that were very bright that night. i noticed another star to the right of venus. i thought it was pretty so i stopped to look at it for a second. star gazing is great to do in arizona. anyway as i was looking at them the star to the right of venus started to move to the north. it went very fast and as it moved it faded until it couldn't be seen. it was very bright. almost as bright as venus. i was sorta wierded out by it.
content.summary: Bright light to the right of venus begins to move fast and fades.

content.detailedDescription:
I was a guest at a family member's home.
we were talking under the clear night sky,
i looked up and observed the 2 objects...
one high in the sky, the other appeared much lower and tracking.
then a burst as what appeared to be a missile came from one speeding towards the higher flying object. it flew off at high speed and the missile disappeared. the lower flying military jet (as i saw it) just followed.

now let me say this, i've looked to the sky before as an amateur student astronomer.
i've seen the shuttle, and the international space station, and nothing ever compared to this event.

what is really funny about it is that when it happened, i didn't even mention to my cousin to look up....I kept it to myself for over 10 years.
 the date is only an approximation....I should have recorded the date...But i bet i wasn't alone that night to see this....And this by the way convinced me of the existance of ufo's because the military fired at it.
content.summary: Military jet fired missiles at very fast very high flying object i just happened to look up to see it happen.

content.detailedDescription:
I watched your video- impressive!

i think personally it was an unidentified object. i am writing you this note because i noticed something you may have not noticed in your video. i see the black dot in the sky after you trying to film (while talking to your neighbor) and then- i noticed around 1:24 or 1:25 into the film that you are looking downward at your device and your thumb is on the screne, at that point a black object passes between your thumb & head and it looks like the black dot taking off quickly. i wonder myself if that was what that was!?

awesome video capture!

i am not a mufon investigator or professional, so i myself dont know what it was actually. i can say ive had some experiences myself before that have left me with no answers and only wondering. i wish you luck in finding out what it might have been:)
content.summary: To the gentleman from tn- object while filming dogs- black disc/sphere in sky

content.detailedDescription: My mother and i were getting ready to get into my car to go to a new years eve party and we noticed the light towards the east just hovering with a slight left to right movement. i used my cell phone to take a video of it. it continued hovering then it seemed to ascent up and east. there were no blinking lights such as in helicopters and planes, just seemed like a flickering light like that of a candle.
content.summary: A hovering orange-red light with slight left to right movement then ascent like a like a candle going out

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside at my home and it was late in the evening around ten oclock. there were some clouds scattered around. the stars are bright and i take walks at night and look at the stars and enjoy the walks. off in the distance the only lights in the area are from walmarts parking lot. which is about 200 feet from where i live. above the parking lot lights in the sky are some clouds slightly lit up from them. i noticed some movement and looked in the clouds above walmart. i first thought it was a flock of birds flying in a v shape. then i saw it was too large and saw the light from the parking lot reflect its flat grey apearance> it was v shaped with maybe four orbs of the same grey color attatched to the back side of the v shape. it was also very brick like in shape. it was boxy not very aerodynamic in nature. it had a patern of something like a grid patern on its underside.  i could easily draw the craft if i was ordered to duplicate it. a month later or so i saw something of the same nature flying the same way and the same direction, it also had the same patern grid underside and grey apearance.  i lived in a city that was close to the bottom of the state of utah and these objects flew or glided up state along state 9 hwy.  these object flew low and flew into the cloud cover and also had no lights at all. they had a flat grey apearance as though they did not want to be seen because that is a good was to avoid being seen by not having a relective body or lights. they made so sound. they had no contrails and theyre speed was aprox., 90 to 120 i think. 
that is all i can recount.
content.summary: Chevron shape grey apearance with attatched grey orbs on rear of craft

content.detailedDescription: Object passed plane or jet then proceded north. it finally turned red and dissapered. we saw the object for two to three mins.
content.summary: Object as big as a star.... and  fast......

content.detailedDescription: It was approx. 7pm 2/12/2012 my fiance an i were coming home from visiting a friend.We were coming up our street i believe this would be east,as we got about 150-200 ft. from our driveway right above us out of nowhere was this big bright light headed in the same direction we were.It was about 500ft above tree level.Maybe a little more.It was the brightest thing iv'e ever seen. it was a pale yellow, green ,white light.It was very big.It was going faster than anything iv'e ever seen.It wasn't a meteor, it wasn't a jet, and it wasn't a falling star.As it passed and went ahead it appeared to disappear. but it could have been going so fast that we just got the imprecision that it disappeared.That's how fast it was.There is a small airport near my house. this was nothing that came from there. there were some air plains in the sky, but they were so high all we could see were the lights blinking. we saw the air plains after we got out of the car standing in the driveway, in shock of what we had just seen.I'm still trying to comprehend what i just saw. it was so bright and so fast. it was amazing!All i can say is if it was a shooting star, it crashed to the ground to the east of kennesaw ga. and i haven't heard anything yet.There was no sound. and i know this, because i was smoking a cig. and i had my window cracked.
content.summary: It was big, bright, and fast. unbelievably fast!
